SHA Accelerator Data Start Address

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0xc
Size:
0x4

Description

The start address for FW controlled SHA performed on data stored in the mailbox. Start Address must be dword aligned.
Caliptra Access: RW
SOC Access: RW

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:0] ADDR rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

ADDR

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_rst_b
